import './View.css'; import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const View = () => { const {id}= useParams(); console.log(id); const retrivedata = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactionForm")); console.log(retrivedata[id]) return ( <>

Transaction

{[retrivedata[id]].map((data, index) => ( <>
{data.transactionDate.value}
{data.monthYear.value}
{Intl.NumberFormat("en-IN", { style: "currency", currency: "INR", }).format(data.transactionAmount.value)}
{data.fromAccount.value}
{data.toAccount.value}
{data.notes.value}
))}
View Transaction
); } export default View;
